content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. Let's talk about the rental price. I am always open to suggestions.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am aware that the market price for an apartment like this in the city center is around 650 Euro. However, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I am willing to pay 500 Euro.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your honesty, but 500 Euro is quite low for an apartment of this quality in the city center. I am willing to negotiate, but I believe you could offer a bit more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that 500 Euro is low, but considering that the apartment is unfurnished, I need to buy furniture, which adds to the cost. I am willing to pay 550 Euro.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While I understand your situation, 550 Euro still seems a bit low for the location and amenities. I am willing to listen to a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I am willing to pay 600 Euro. I hope this will meet your requirements.

[answered]
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 600 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Wang. I appreciate your understanding and look forward to having you as a tenant. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
